text: , also known by the pseudonyms Tycoon To$h or Typhoom Tosh, was a Japanese musician and graphic designer. He was best known as the founding member of new wave band Plastics in 1976. He was at first a part of the technopop fever in Japan and later acted as a pioneer of the Japanese hip hop scene with his label Major Force. Nakanishi died in Tokyo from esophageal cancer on February 25, 2017, aged 61. ==References== ==Other websites== * Toshio Nakanishi Discography Category:1956 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from esophageal cancer Category:Musicians from Tokyo
title: Toshio Nakanishi
